name: Hunter Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Hunter Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Hunter API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Hunter API | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 作用: Operation to consume | 默认值: domainSearch
available_options: Domain Search (值: domainSearch) - Get every email address found on the internet using a given domain name, with sources
Email Finder (值: emailFinder) - Generate or retrieve the most likely email address from a domain name, a first name and a last name
Email Verifier (值: emailVerifier) - Verify the deliverability of an email address

domain.name: domain
domain.description: Domain name from which you want to find the email addresses. For example, "stripe.com".
domain.natural_language_description: 参数名: Domain | 作用: Domain name from which you want to find the email addresses. For example, "stripe.com". | (必填项)

onlyEmails.name: onlyEmails
onlyEmails.description: Whether to return only the found emails
onlyEmails.natural_language_description: 参数名: Only Emails | 作用: Whether to return only the found emails | 默认值: True

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

firstname.name: firstname
firstname.description: The person's first name. It doesn't need to be in lowercase.
firstname.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | 作用: The person's first name. It doesn't need to be in lowercase. | (必填项)

lastname.name: lastname
lastname.description: The person's last name. It doesn't need to be in lowercase.
lastname.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | 作用: The person's last name. It doesn't need to be in lowercase. | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: The email address you want to verify
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email address you want to verify | (必填项)
